IndriQuery.FieldExtentRestriction.Relation  
QueryRequest.SnippetType  
 

Package edu.cmu.commons.indri.api Description

Basic serializable data structures and remoted interfaces for interaction with the Indri Java JNI library. No classes in this package rely on Indri JNI. They can be safely included in a derivative application without including an indri.jar.
